vote.title: To authorize the Executive Director, Office of CelebrateOne, and Columbus Public Health, to accept a grant from the Ohio Department of Health in the amount of $722,375.00 for the Ohio Equity Initiative 2.0 Project through December 31, 2023; to authorize the appropriation and expenditure of up to $722,375.00 from the Cityâ€™s General Government Grant Fund to cover a percentage of the costs of the team managing the project and to cover other operational expenses including but not limited to: office supplies, outreach materials, professional development, and mileage reimbursement; and to declare an emergency. ($722,375.00)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
